You gain your mystery's initial revelation spell (@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Call to Arms]{Call to Arms}). Casting this spell progresses your @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Oracular Curse]{Oracular Curse}. Use the minor curse from your mystery, but when you progress it again, instead of your mystery's moderate curse effect, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} in addition to the effects of the minor curse.

If you don't have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Refocus]{Refocus} by reconciling the conflicting nature of your mystery, which also reduces your curse to minor.

Minor Curse of Battle

Your body languishes when you aren't bringing harm to your foes. You take a -2 status penalty to AC and saving throws, but each time you make a Strike, you can suspend these penalties until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feature-effects.Effect: Minor Battle Curse]{Effect: Minor Battle Curse}
